Shadecrystal Barrage.tooltip: Summons bursts of shadecrystals that can home in on enemies

Slithering Eels.tooltip: Casts a magical acid eel that releases acid drops as it moves

Star Shower.tooltip: Casts a spread of astral stars from the sky that converge at the cursor

Tears of Heaven.tooltip: Casts slow-moving homing balls of heavenly light

Tome of Fates.tooltip: Casts cosmic tentacles to spear your enemies

Winter's Fury.tooltip: Fires a stream of ice orbs and a barrage of ice shards towards the cursor

Wrath of the Ancients.tooltip: Summons an energy pulse at the cursor to periodically summon homing spirits

Augur of the Elements.tooltip: Casts a burst of elemental tentacles to spear your enemies

Biofusillade.tooltip: Unleashes a concentrated beam of life energy

The Dance of Light.tooltip: Barrages enemies with a hailstorm of Light Blades

Eternity.tooltip: Hexes a possible nearby enemy, trapping them in a brilliant display of destruction

Event Horizon.tooltip: Fires a ring of stars to home in on nearby enemies

Heresy.tooltip: Releases fire and souls upward from a held book

Light God's Brilliance.tooltip: Casts small, homing light beads along with explosive light balls

Nuclear Fury.tooltip: Casts a torrent of cosmic typhoons

Primordial Ancient.tooltip: Casts a gigantic blast of dust

Rancor.tooltip: Casts a magic circle that charges energy and eventually releases a powerful laser burst of controlled maleficent magic

Recitation of the Beast.tooltip: Summons beast scythes around the player in a small circle,

Rouge Slash.tooltip: Fires a wave of 3 rouge air slashes

Subsuming Vortex.tooltip: Press Left Click to release a barrage of vortices that race towards enemies

The Cauldron.tooltip: Launches lava bombs which explode into more lava bombs

Sparkling Empress.tooltip: Fires a concentrated laser to annihilate your foes

Anahita's Arpeggio.tooltip: Casts slow-moving treble clefs that confuse enemies

Arctic Bear Paw.tooltip: Fires spiritual claws that ignore walls

Belching Saxophone.tooltip: Fires an array of dirty reeds, music notes, and sulphuric bubbles

Dark Spark.tooltip: 'And everything under the sun is in tune,

Ghastly Visage.tooltip: Fires homing ghast energy that explodes

Gruesome Eminence.tooltip: Summons a gaseous conglomeration of spirits near the cursor

Yharim's Crystal.tooltip: Fires draconic beams of total annihilation

Eye of Night.tooltip: Summons a diseased eyeball that fires cells which attach to enemies

Flesh of Infidelity.tooltip: Summons a tentacled ball of flesh that splashes blood onto enemies

Harvest Staff.tooltip: Grows a pumpkin patch that sprouts pumpkins nearby

Spikecrag Staff.tooltip: Summons a spikecrag to protect you

Sanctified Spark.tooltip: Summons a profaned energy turret to fight for you

Meteor Fist.tooltip: Fires a rocket fist that explodes forcefully

Shock Grenade.tooltip: Throws a grenade that explodes into a burst of lightning
